not_have_account: Don't have an account yet? Register
has_account: Already have an account? Log in
already_attacked: This hero has already attacked this turn.
your_turn_choose_hero: It's your turn to choose a hero
waiting_for_opponent_choose: Waiting for the opponent to choose
first_punch_desc: The hero's first attack in the match deals +2 damage.
poison_attack_desc: Poisons the enemy for 3 turns, dealing 1 damage per turn. Deals +2 extra damage to already poisoned enemies.
good_luck_desc: 50% chance to gain +1 attack when the turn changes.
beyond_front_desc: Attacks up to 3 hexes in a straight line in the attack direction, if occupied by enemies.
broken_defense_desc: Deals (+1) damage to enemies with the "Taunt" status.
trust_in_team_desc: Gains +1 attack when allies are in adjacent tiles.
absorb_roots_desc: Heals an amount equal to the damage dealt.
alone_is_better_desc: Deals double damage to isolated enemies.
clean_desc: Removes negative effects from nearby allies.
rage_desc: Pushes the enemy 1 tile backward. If blocked, the enemy takes damage. (+1)
